body: Hi Reinier, There are two solutions that I can think of. One is to use one of the other more advanced meshing tools in Grasshopper to generate a better mesh. If you don't want to do that what I usually do is to generate test points using evaluate surface and color surfaces instead of a mesh. I attached an example.
